pages.text: The Mutation Matrix acts as the crucible for the Ravenous Maw's evolution. Through this device, you may bind new Mutations to the vessel using specific Mutagens and Feasts.
Align the ritual components carefully: place the Ravenous Maw in the left slot, the Feast in the center, and the Mutagen in the right. Once the triumvirate is set, behold the transmutation.
